a.title: View full profile of Deepak Chahar

span.class: ds-text-tight-s ds-font-medium ds-text-typo ds-underline ds-decoration-ui-stroke hover:ds-text-typo-primary hover:ds-decoration-ui-stroke-primary ds-block ds-cursor-pointer
ds-flex ds-items-center ds-cursor-pointer ds-justify-end ds-relative ds-text-typo ds-left-[15px]

div.div:
5.3 to
GJ Maxwell ,
CSK have come roaring back. Maxwell is gone for a golden duck. What a huge wicket. Short of a length, top of off or thereabouts, Maxwell looks to punch at it with an open face. The face is just too open. Edges it to Dhoni. Actually off the face of the bat. This game has turned on its head.
42 / 3

img.alt: Ruturaj Gaikwad and Faf du Plessis get the IPL started
When it comes to CSK and MS Dhoni, who can argue?
MS Dhoni, out of cricket since the last IPL, gets a feel of the ball in his gloves

span.class: ds-text-compact-xs ds-text-typo ds-underline ds-decoration-ui-stroke hover:ds-text-typo-primary hover:ds-decoration-ui-stroke-primary ds-block

a.title: View full profile of Mustafizur Rahman

span.class: ds-text-tight-s ds-font-medium ds-text-typo ds-underline ds-decoration-ui-stroke hover:ds-text-typo-primary hover:ds-decoration-ui-stroke-primary ds-block ds-cursor-pointer
ds-flex ds-items-center ds-cursor-pointer ds-justify-end ds-relative ds-text-typo ds-left-[15px]

div.div:
4.3 to
F du Plessis ,
The Fizz strikes in his first over this IPL. The cutter from Mustafizur. Bowls at 130ks, on a length, outside off, du Plessis early into it, and ends up miscuing it to deep point.
41 / 1

4.6 to
RM Patidar ,
double strike for the Fizz. He has been done in by pace again. A Test-match dismissal. On a good length, wobble-seam, just going with the angle. No feet from Patidar, slightly late on it, edges it through.
41 / 2

img.alt: Mustafizur Rahman's double-strike turned the tempo of the powerplay

div.h2: Live - Mustafizur, Chahar go bang bang for CSK

p.div: IPL 2024 is here, buckle up! Chennai Super Kings (new captain in place) host Royal Challengers Bengaluru (new name in place) to get this show on the road

img.alt: Live - Mustafizur, Chahar go bang bang for CSK

div.h2: Gaikwad: Last year itself, Dhoni had hinted about captaincy

p.div: Dhoni had told Gaikwad to "be ready, it shouldn't be a surprise to you"

img.alt: Gaikwad: Last year itself, Dhoni had hinted about captaincy

div.h2: A season begins, an era ends, and life goes on for MS Dhoni

p.div: His last act as captain was lifting the IPL trophy. His most lasting act, subverting expectation

img.alt: A season begins, an era ends, and life goes on for MS Dhoni

div.h2: Dhoni's new role, Kohli's comeback in focus in IPL 2024 season opener

p.div: RCB haven't beaten CSK in Chennai since IPL 2008. Will that streak continue or end on Friday?

img.alt: Dhoni's new role, Kohli's comeback in focus in IPL 2024 season opener

div.h2: Dhoni stepping down as captain opens up tactical possibilities for CSK

p.div: Thanks to the Impact Player rule, CSK could be tempted to have him on field for 20 overs, and use him as a batter when his impact can be maximum

img.alt: Dhoni stepping down as captain opens up tactical possibilities for CSK
